archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0995
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Payments specialist, I want to be able to allocate payments to specified invoices and not just the oldest aged debt, this will mean easier identificaiton of invoices and also any charges left unpaid making more accute collections reporting

properties.value: Requirement clear. Rules to be agreed on LLD phase

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
